idea:
Sarvotech offers commercial induction equipment to restaurant owners, hoteliers, caterers and other food services businesses a serious energy-saving advantage in their kitchens.

Sarvotech induction cooking equipment is available in India with reliability, reasonable pricing, power ranging from 300 watts to 80 kilowatts for heavy duty cooking.

Above all we provide prompt service support in PAN India. Sarvotech has its own dedicated young professionals not only in designing and fabrication, but also in execution of after sales service.
name: SARVOTECH INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Famferry LogoFAMFERRY

Stop Corona

FamFerry About Us

FamFerry is a memes collections apps. India is a developing country and with increasing development, the use of social networking messaging sites is also prevailing vigorously, especially among youngsters. With a lot of time, Indians are compelled to use various non- Indian messaging sites and apps for their convenient and entertainment. Now, Gone are those days, when people have to use foreigner’s social networking sites. India with its full of its sovereignty, power and zeal has introduced a new revolution in the field of social networking called FamFerry. As name refers it has rooted the entire world in itself. FamFerry is the Invention of New India. It will lead to play an active participation in forming a Digital India. It connects the people throughout the world with features and Characteristics which has never been introduced ever. Here in FamFerry family users can share, receive & send (photos, videos). It’s not limited to this only, it’s introduced with many possibilities and research to make it better and convenient is going on. Time has come to prove Patriotism towards the nation by saying goodbye to all non-Indian apps which we used to use earlier on. India takes a pledge to give your contribution in introducing a new and modern revolution by using India’s largest social Networking Indian site FamFerry. This is the only Indian app for Android.
name: FamFerry Private Limited
